text: This is what the Lord GOD showed me: he was forming locusts at the time the latter growth began to sprout (it was the latter growth after the king&#39s mowings).
When they had finished eating the grass of the land, I said, &#34O Lord GOD, forgive, I beg you! How can Jacob stand? He is so small!&#34
The LORD relented concerning this; &#34It shall not be,&#34 said the LORD.
This is what the Lord GOD showed me: the Lord GOD was calling for a shower of fire, and it devoured the great deep and was eating up the land.
Then I said, &#34O Lord GOD, cease, I beg you! How can Jacob stand? He is so small!&#34
The LORD relented concerning this; &#34This also shall not be,&#34 said the Lord GOD.
This is what he showed me: the Lord was standing beside a wall built with a plumb line, with a plumb line in his hand.

And the LORD said to me, &#34Amos, what do you see?&#34 And I said, &#34A plumb line.&#34 Then the Lord said, &#34See, I am setting a plumb line in the midst of my people Israel; I will never again pass them by;
the high places of Isaac shall be made desolate, and the sanctuaries of Israel shall be laid waste, and I will rise against the house of Jeroboam with the sword.&#34
Then Amaziah, the priest of Bethel, sent to King Jeroboam of Israel, saying, &#34Amos has conspired against you in the very center of the house of Israel; the land is not able to bear all his words.
For thus Amos has said, &#39Jeroboam shall die by the sword, and Israel must go into exile away from his land.&#39&#34
And Amaziah said to Amos, &#34O seer, go, flee away to the land of Judah, earn your bread there, and prophesy there;
but never again prophesy at Bethel, for it is the king&#39s sanctuary, and it is a temple of the kingdom.&#34
Then Amos answered Amaziah, &#34I am no prophet, nor a prophet&#39s son; but I am a herdsman, and a dresser of sycamore trees,
and the LORD took me from following the flock, and the LORD said to me, &#39Go, prophesy to my people Israel.&#39
&#34Now therefore hear the word of the LORD. You say, &#39Do not prophesy against Israel, and do not preach against the house of Isaac.&#39

Therefore thus says the LORD: &#39Your wife shall become a prostitute in the city, and your sons and your daughters shall fall by the sword, and your land shall be parceled out by line; you yourself shall die in an unclean land, and Israel shall surely go into exile away from its land.&#39&#34
